Marcantonio.js¶

Marcantonio.js is an abstraction layer for Raphaël meant to make it easier to quickly create basic interactive graphics.

Adding interactivity to static graphics is especially quick, but for more complicated interactions, all of the underlying Raphaël elements are still accessible.
